mapper.select: SELECT b.`uid`, b.`board_kind_uid`, b.`user_uid`, u.`nickname`, b.`title`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment WHERE board_uid = b.`uid`) as `comment_count`, b.`sdate`, b.`udate` FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.`user_uid` = u.`uid` WHERE board_kind_uid = #{board_kind_uid} ORDER BY `uid` DESC LIMIT ${page.page}, ${page.range};

SELECT b.`uid`, b.`board_kind_uid`, b.`user_uid`, u.`nickname`, b.`title`, b.`body`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment WHERE board_uid = b.`uid`) as `comment_count`, b.`sdate`, b.`udate` FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.`user_uid` = u.`uid` WHERE b.`uid` = #{board_uid};
